functions.name: DropItem
functions.desc: Asks the server to drop the given item by its ID

params.name: itemId
params.desc: The ID of the item you want the player to drop

functions.name: GetCurrentItems
functions.desc: Returns all the items that are currently enabled. It will hide disabled items

functions.name: GetAllItems
functions.desc: Returns all the items the player current has in his inventory!

functions.name: GetItem
functions.desc: Returns an item from the players inventory by ID

params.name: itemId
params.desc: The ID of the item you want to get

functions.name: GetEquipped
functions.desc: Returns the item that is currently equipped if there's any

functions.name: GetItemCount
functions.desc: Returns the amount of items you currently have in your inventory

functions.name: AddLifeCycle
functions.desc: Adds an item lifecycle into the game system

params.name: itemLifeCycle
params.desc: The lifecycle to be cached on the system

functions.name: AddLifeCycles
functions.desc: Adds an array of lifecycles into the game system

params.name: itemLifeCycle
params.desc: The array of lifecycles to be cached on the system

functions.name: PressedNumber
functions.desc: Warns the system that a number key has been pressed

functions.name: _PressedKey
functions.desc: Signals to the inventory controller that a key has been pressed

params.name: keyCode
params.desc: The KeyCode that was pressed on the keyboard

functions.name: _ItemRemoved
functions.desc: Method to clear removed item information

functions.name: _GetFirstEmptyIndex
functions.desc:
Looks for the first empty index that it can use 
O(n^2) complexity so I might have to optimize it in the future

functions.name: _ItemAdded
functions.desc: Method to add item information to the cache

params.name: item
params.desc: The Item object that has been added

functions.name: _ItemDropped
functions.desc: TO-DO

functions.name: _GetItemStaticData
functions.desc: Gets an item static data

params.name: itemName
params.desc: The name of the item (This is not the ID)

functions.name: _GetLifeCycles
functions.desc: Gets a lifecycle template with the given item name

params.name: itemName
params.desc: The name of the item (This is not the ID)

functions.name: _GetItemLifeCycles
functions.desc: Gets a lifecycle by an itemID

functions.name: _SetLifeCycles
functions.desc: Adds a lifecycle to a given weapon

functions.name: _RemoveLifeCycles
functions.desc: Removes the lifecycle which is attached to a given weapon

functions.name: _ItemUnequipped
functions.desc: Called when an item gets unequipped

functions.name: _ItemDataChanged
functions.desc:
Called when the data of an item changes


param @newValue any -- The new value that replaced the custom value

params.name: itemId
params.desc: The ID of the unique item

params.name: dataIndex
params.desc: The index being used for this custom data

functions.name: _ItemEquipped
functions.desc: Called when the item gets equipped

params.name: itemId
params.desc: The ID of the unique item

functions.name: _InventoryCleared
functions.desc: Called when the inventory is completely cleared

name: InventoryController
desc: This contains the Inventory Controller that manages our client side of the inventory
